original_text: And Samuel said to him, “The Lord has torn the kingdom of Israel from you this day and has given it to a neighbor of yours, who is better than you.
korean_text: 사무엘이 그에게 이르되 여호와께서 오늘 이스라엘 나라를 왕에게서 떼어 왕보다 나은 왕의 이웃에게 주셨나이다

sentences.original_text: “The Lord has torn the kingdom of Israel from you this day
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 오늘 이스라엘 왕국을 네게서 찢어 내셨고

sentences.original_text: and has given it to a neighbor of yours,
